# Change log

## [v0.3.0] - 2020-01-16

### Changed
* Change gemspec to update metadata and remove test artifacts

## [v0.2.1] - 2019-06-15

### Changed
* Change to relax bundler dependency

## [v0.2.0] - 2018-12-02

### Changed
* Change to Ruby >= 2.0

## [v0.1.0] - 2015-05-16

* Initial implementation and release
